item.description: About me Hello, I am Francesco. I am an Italian Software Engineer with a strong foundation in computer science and a passion for solving complex problems. I am interested in a range of topics, including distributed systems, databases, compression techniques, distributed computing, and machine learning. Feel free to have a look at my Github, or get in touch on Linkedin.

Resume Education University of Milan 2020 - 2022 Master of Science in Computer Science University of Trento 2017 - 2020 Bachelor of Science in Computer Science Work Experience Software Engineer Jan 2023 - Present Satispay, Milan, Italy Software Engineer Intern Feb 2020 - May 2020 Spaziodati, Trento, Italy Skills Programming Languages Java, Python, C++ Technologies PostgreSQL, AWS, Spring, Docker, Spark, Git, Linux Topics Microservices, Data compression, Distributed systems, Machine learning, Testing, CI/CD
